text: Paul Jenkins (August 2, 1938 - July 1, 2013) was an American actor. He appeared on many television programs such as M*A*S*H, Columbo, Lou Grant, Kojak, The Partridge Family, and in Starsky and Hutch. He is mostly known for his roles as Professor Parks in The Waltons and as Eddie in Dynasty. Jenkins was born on August 2, 1938 in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. He retired in 2005. Jenkins died on July 1, 2013, following a brief illness in Los Angeles, California, aged 74. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1938 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Disease-related deaths in Los Angeles Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Philadelphia
title: Paul Jenkins (actor)
